constraint.name: ca_tour_pasajeros_users_lastnick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (lastnick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_pasajeros_users_nick
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (nick) REFERENCES users (nick) ON DELETE SET NULL ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_pasajeros_contactos
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idcontacto) REFERENCES contactos (idcontacto) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE

constraint.name: ca_tour_pasajeros_tour_servicios
constraint.type: FOREIGN KEY (idservicio) REFERENCES tour_servicios (id) ON DELETE RESTRICT ON UPDATE CASCADE
